heading:
Reading : Horse Shoe

The Horse Shoe reading attempts to answer a specific question of the player by also looking at the situation the player is in.

This reading analyzes your question in the past, present and future, and will provide a piece of advice to the player.

cards.readingSpotExplanation: Card 1 points towards the past and the circumstances in the past that led you to your present situation.
Card 3 describes some of what to expect in the future.
Card 4 is the advice card and indicates the best course of action for you.
Card 5 describes how the people and institutions around you view your current situation.
Card 6 points toward the obstacles that the player will find most difficult.
